basic_info.title: Dost Scholarship 2024-25, Benefits, Courses, Requirements, Application Process
basic_info.author: Muhammad Saim Rasheed
basic_info.funded_by: Department of Science and Technology of the Philippines

program_details.description: The DOST Foreign Graduate Scholarship Program is a scholarship initiative offered by the Department of Science and Technology of the Philippines. The program is designed to support Filipino scientists, researchers, and professionals who wish to pursue advanced studies (master’s or doctoral degrees) in science and engineering disciplines from reputable universities abroad. The program aims to enhance the country’s research and development capabilities by providing qualified individuals with opportunities for higher education and training in various scientific fields.

financial_coverage: Tuition and other school fees up to PHP 40,000 per academic year
Book allowance of PHP 10,000 per year

other_criteria: Belonging to the top 5% of high school graduating class or having a GPA of at least 85% in STEM subjects
Intended course must be a priority course by DOST
Meet admission requirements of the foreign university for foreign scholarship

required_documents: Certified true copy of birth certificate
Certified copy of high school mark sheet
Transcripts of records from previous degrees (graduate students only)
Valid passport and other identification documents
